PROJECT_ROOM.DUPLICATE_SHORT_NAME: A site with the specified name exists. Choose other short name.
PROJECT_ROOM.NAME: Project room name
PROJECT_ROOM.READY_TO_CREATE_PROJECT_ROOM: You are now ready to create a project room and start collaborating with your colleagues and stakeholders.
PROJECT_ROOM.DOCS_TO_COPY: The following documents will be copied to the project room
PROJECT_ROOM.PARTICIPANTS_WILL_HAVE_ACCESS: The following participants will have access to the project room
PROJECT_ROOM.INVALID_SHORT_NAME: Please enter a valid short name (min 3 letters, underscore allowed)
PROJECT_ROOM.READY_TO_CLOSE_PROJECT_ROOM: You are now ready to close the project room "{{projectRoom}}" and return back to the case "{{case}}".
PROJECT_ROOM.SELECT_DOCUMENTS_TO_COPY_BACK_TO_CASE: Select documents to copy back to the case
PROJECT_ROOM.DOCS_TO_COPY_BACK: The following documents will be copied back to the case
PROJECT_ROOM.CONFIRM_CANCEL_INVITE: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation?
PROJECT_ROOM.CONFIRM_REMOVE_PARTICIPANT: Are you sure you want to remove this participant?
PROJECT_ROOM.CONFIRM_REJECT_INVITE: Are you sure you want to reject the invitation from {{fromFirstName}} {{fromLastName}} to join the "{{siteTitle}}" project room?
PROJECT_ROOM.REJECT_INVITE_SUCCESS: Your invitation to join the "{{siteTitle}}" project room has been successfully canceled.
PROJECT_ROOM.INVITE_FAILURE: Failed to process the invitation. Perhaps it has been already accepted/declined or the inviter canceled it.
